document.full_text: former bosnian serb military commander ratko mladic was extradited to the netherlands tuesday to face genocide charges at the u.n. war crimes tribunal in the hague after 16 years on the run.
document.title: top war crimes suspect mladic arrives at the hague
lines_and_colors: former bosnian serb military commander ratko mladic was extradited to the netherlands tuesday to face genocide charges at the u.n. war crimes tribunal in the hague after 16 years on the run.
